scripts.build: npm run build:dashboard && npm run build:functions
scripts.build:dashboard: cd dashboard && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:functions: cd functions && npm install && npm run build
scripts.deploy:hosting: npm run build:dashboard && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:functions: npm run build:functions && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.test:deploy: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting,functions --dry-run
